description: The only thing better than a good brownie is a good brownie with coffee in it. These mocha brownies are rich and delicious.
name: Delicious Mocha Brownies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170Â°C. Place the chopped chocolate and butter in a heat-proof bowl over a saucepan of boiling water, ensuring the bowl doesn't touch the water. Stir until melted. Remove from the heat and leave to cool slightly.
Whisk the eggs and sugar together in a large bowl and pour over the chocolate mix. Stir well with a wooden spoon to incorporate.
Whisk the flour, baking powder, salt and espresso powder together in a large bowl. Tip into the chocolate mix and stir to combine.
Pour the batter into a lined 8 inch baking tin and bake for 20 minutes, until the top has crusted. Remove from the oven and allow to cool completely. Chill in the fridge for 1 hour, slice and serve.
